title: Spring Is Here
description: Spring Is Here introduces readers to the signs of spring in different outdoor settings, such as the garden, pond, and mountains. The text includes a table of contents and glossary of content vocabulary words.
meta: buds, bulbs, dandelion, garden, gophers, meadow, ponds, shoots, water lily, wiggly, woods
Classify Information : Classify information in text
Quotation Marks : Identify and use quotation marks
Content Vocabulary : Identify content vocabulary words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
